sentences.sContent: In order to provide an evaluation of the social networking impact one-business, we are starting our attempt from word-of-mouth marketplaces or overstock auctions or reputation systems.
sentences.sContent_eng: In order to provide an evaluation of the social networking impact one-business, we are starting our attempt from word-of-mouth marketplaces or overstock auctions or reputation systems.
sentences.sCn: 为了提供一个社交网络对电子商务影响的评估，我们尝试从口碑市场或库存过剩拍卖或声誉系统开始。

words.tran: 垫得又软又厚的；冗长的；多油的
[经] 供给过多；过多的供应品
装填过度；涂油过多（overstuff的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to obtain more of something than is needed
